subject: [Radiance-general] Transmission Matrix.
body:
For what I understand, that is not an error, it is more like a warning...
what I mean is that you can still use that for the Three-phase method.

I tend to think that the calculations may be spectrally-averaged, wich may
be important or not depending on the level of spectral-selectivity of the
glazing you are using.


Lets wait and see what the expert say anyway.

Best Regards,

German


2013/5/13 <oga6ya at yahoo.co.jp>
